Good Day,

I have a test that runs on eclipse. It has parameter -DinputFile=
=3Dfile.txt. Now I want to run it at the command prompt. I built everything=
 as a jar then run:

java -cp jarfile.jar org.junit.runner.JUnitCore junit.=
test.to.run -DinputFile=3Dfile.txt

But I get an error of Could not find cl=
ass: -DinputFile=3Dfile.txt

Am I doing something wrong?

Thanks,
Law
